requestHugAnswer:
%s Of course you can have a hug! 
*HUGS* %s %s
botHugAnswer:
Awwww. That's very sweet of you. 
Thank you %s. %s
cooldownMessage: %s Oh my. I can't keep up with that many hugs. You'll have to let me cool down for a bit! %s
cooldownMessageMegaHug: %s Oh no! I can't let you Megahug another pony today. That would be far too dangerous! Too much hugging energy!
megaSelfHugAnswer:
Oh my. You must really like me if you're using your megahug on me! 
Thank you %s! %s
megaHugAnswer: %s You have been Megahugged! It looks like somepony really wanted to hug you! %s
